caption: STANDARDIZED CET1 RATIO
trend_summary: The Standardized CET1 Ratio decreased from 15.7% in 4Q24 to 15.4% in 1Q25. The decrease was primarily driven by Capital Distributions (63 bps) and RWA growth (53 bps), partially offset by Net Income (82 bps).

caption: STANDARDIZED RISK-WEIGHTED ASSETS ($B)
trend_summary: Standardized Risk-Weighted Assets increased from $1,757B in 4Q24 to $1,818B in 1Q25, an increase of $61B. The growth was driven by Credit Risk ex. Lending ($46B) and Market Risk ($15B).
